text: Harvard Business School and Harvard
Medical School want to help you scale up
your healthc care Innovation we are
launching the health acceleration
challenge to find new health care
innovations that if widely adopted will
dramatically change healthc care
delivery in the United States what is a
healthcare Innovation we are collecting
the molecular and clinical data of 1,000
my patients
and pushing every bit of that data out
to the public domain where it can be
shared quickly we have developed and
continually monitored processes and
metrics around patient satisfaction
resulting in a 40% Improvement we built
a company to redesign the medical
referral process by getting Primary Care
Providers quick opinions and Specialists
we eliminate avoidable referrals and
improve patient care our walk-in clinics
in 28 States enable patients to get care
that is convenient high quality and 40
to 80% less expensive kyus helps
patients get to the right provider the
first time in a way that reduces
appointment weight times for us as
patients and helps hospitals optimize
their provider capacity across the
entire Health System Healthcare needs
more disruptive Innovations like these
what's your Innovation going to be join
the conversation at Health acceleration
challenge.com
